messages.subject: Re: being part of a family/community
messages.msgSnippet: There isn t anyone to care for the animals, and even if there were, our finances wouldn t allow the trip.  I can t even make it to town for groceries right
messages.messageBody:
There isn't anyone to care for the animals, and even if there were,
our finances wouldn't allow the trip. I can't even make it to town
for groceries right now. :)

~A

--- In unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com, "Ren Allen"
<starsuncloud@n...> wrote:
> "We also couldn't leave
> the animals with no care, nor taking the time away from our kids."
>
> That's the beauty of an unschooling conference...it's for the whole
> family. Do you not have neighbors that will watch the animals for
a
> weekend?
> Time away from the kids is NOT an issue at Live and Learn!:)
>
> Ren

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] being part of a family/community
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/11/2004 3:28:18 PM Eastern Daylight Time, starsuncloud@netzero.net writes: Do you  not have neighbors that will watch the animals for a
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/11/2004 3:28:18 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
starsuncloud@... writes:

Do you not have neighbors that will watch the animals for a
weekend?



that isnt an option here, unfortunately I rescue small breed dogs- mostly
dachshunds and my kids help with that too but I really dont have anyone I can
trust for an entire weekend. we havent even had a vacation in 5 years-- not
complaining mind you-- it saves a bunch of money and there are still day trips
:) ( 6 hrs or less)

Lin


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: being part of a family/community
messages.msgSnippet: We also couldn t leave the animals with no care, nor taking the time away from our kids. That s the beauty of an unschooling conference...it s for the whole
messages.messageBody:
"We also couldn't leave
the animals with no care, nor taking the time away from our kids."

That's the beauty of an unschooling conference...it's for the whole
family. Do you not have neighbors that will watch the animals for a
weekend?
Time away from the kids is NOT an issue at Live and Learn!:)

Ren
